name: ofuse
short_description:
(1) When a file is changed on a file system and a change is Committed, the file's ArbitraryNaturalNumbers version IDs increase.

(2) To prevent file system's bitsize growth, there are file Move/Copy operations which disallow simultaneous access at runtime and reset the target file version ID to 0, if there was no file at the destination place.

(3) Deleted files do not keep their version IDs at the level of a file system.

(4) To be continued.

Implementations to create: Linux FUSE.
summary: A virtual file system with file versions as arbitrary natural numbers
